name: COVID-19 Death Forecasts
description: The goal of this repository is to create a standardized set of data on forecasts from experienced teams making projections of cumulative and incident deaths due to COVID-19 in the United States.

targets.name: 1 day ahead cum death
targets.description: One- to seven-day ahead forecasts will be defined as the number of cumulative deaths for the target day.

targets.name: 10 day ahead cum death
targets.description: Zero- to one-hundred-thirty-day ahead forecasts will be defined as the number of cumulative deaths for the target day.

targets.name: 10 day ahead inc death
targets.description: Zero- to one-hundred-thirty-day ahead forecasts will be defined as the number of incident deaths for the target day.
